channel.title: Season 1 Sannin
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Season 1 Sannin" - Any villages with slots available?

item.title: Re: Season 1 Sannin
item.content:encoded: Moon Village welcomes Sanin runners. Just say in your application text that it's for the Sanin run.

item.title: Re: Season 1 Sannin
item.content:encoded: Try looking in the recruitment center.Also,leave your village.Trust me.I know from experience,when you're a Jonin with no village,people will most likely be mailing you to join their's like mad.

item.title: Season 1 Sannin
item.content:encoded:
I've only got a couple of days left before my Stamina starts getting cut, and I don't think I've been doing very well in preparation for a Sannin run thus far. However, I'm going to make my shot at it, and was wondering if there were any villages with an Epic Monument/Juice Bar [Without it, I don't have much of a shot] who wouldn't mind allowing a Sannin Runner in temporarily.

I really don't have much time, and I'm probably going to leave my village within the next couple of days just to have enough time to get into a different village before my times up. o_O

So thanks in advance!
